<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insn shuffling priority.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonshuffler-cpp-/hexagonbid"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonshuffler-cpp-/hexagonbid/#a1b28ac4a7d9a2e0ee70f8c02595adf07">HexagonBid</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The priority is directly proportional to how restricted the insn is based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on its flexibility to run on the available slots.  So, the fewer slots it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may run on, the higher its priority.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check and prepare packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ok = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonshuffler/#a50666b23b01ea45d060a07f7e9718b62">check</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonshuffler/#a0ebda228b167d8ea7cc3982c5636cd5b">size</a>() &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; Ok)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reorder the handles for each slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> nSlot = 0, emptySlots = 0; nSlot &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagonmctargetdesc-h/#a8f76c0f5e34856920717e06ebc5f4dc3">HEXAGON&#95;PACKET&#95;SIZE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">         ++nSlot) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonshuffler/#a8bf48781a4bc4943575e1b9974e9b327">iterator</a> ISJ, ISK;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> slotSkip, slotWeight;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prioritize the handles considering their restrictions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ISJ = ISK = Packet.begin(), slotSkip = slotWeight = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">           ISK != Packet.end(); ++ISK, ++slotSkip)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (slotSkip &lt; nSlot - emptySlots)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note which handle to begin at.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++ISJ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the weight of the slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">          slotWeight += ISK-&gt;Core.setWeight(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagonmctargetdesc-h/#a8f76c0f5e34856920717e06ebc5f4dc3">HEXAGON&#95;PACKET&#95;SIZE</a> - nSlot - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (slotWeight)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort the packet, favoring source order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beginning after the previous slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::stable&#95;sort(ISJ, Packet.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip unused slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++emptySlots;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstr">HexagonInstr</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ISJ : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonshuffler/#a07b8ee7062fa43085d66306471c646ed">insts</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
